items.sentence: Tom is the one who suggested that we not do this.
Tom is the one who usually takes out the garbage.
Tom knew many of the carpenters who worked there.
We might not need to go to the supermarket today.
Tom unscrewed the cap and handed the jar to Mary.
I came up with a plan. It\'s a good one, I think.
I can always come back later if you\'re busy now.
I offered Tom a good deal, but he turned it down.
You\'re too young to go there alone, aren\'t you?
What do you say we plan a surprise party for Tom?
He wrote down the name so he wouldn\'t forget it.
Tom really enjoys talking with Mary, doesn\'t he?
We have no plans to replace Tom after he retires.
We have to stop Tom before he hurts anybody else.
You don\'t have to help us if you don\'t want to.
Tom and Mary almost always agree with each other.
One thing Tom hates is not being taken seriously.
I wonder how long it\'ll be before Tom gets here.
A taxi to the airport costs about thirty dollars.
Advertising is the driving force behind commerce.
